summary.span: 定义用于创建对等消息传输通道的绑定元素。

span.span: Defines the binding element used to create a peer message transport channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此传输不可用于包含请求/答复操作的协定。This transport cannot be used with contracts that have request/reply operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于获取基于传输绑定元素的配置的通道工厂。This method can be used to get a channel factory based on the configuration of the transport binding element. ## Examples 此方法可用于获取通道工厂，以基于传输绑定元素的配置发送消息。This method can be used to get a channel factory for sending messages based on the configuration of the transport binding element.

exception.span: 此绑定上下文指出的通道类型不受支持。

span.span: The channel type indicated by this binding context is not supported.

summary.span: 获取和设置指定发送到此绑定创建的传输通道的最大消息大小的值（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets and sets the value that specifies the maximum size, in bytes, of messages sent over transport channels created by this binding element.

value.span: 指定通过此绑定元素创建的传输通道进行发送的消息的最大大小。

span.span: The maximum size of messages sent over transport channels created by this binding element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认消息大小为 65,536 字节。The default message size is 65,536 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定端口，则会从可用动态端口集中选择端口号。If a port is not specified, then a port number is chosen from the set of available dynamic ports.
